title: Star Wishes
description: Christmas is in the air. It's that glorious and special time of year when magic can happen - if you believe.But Holly Starr stopped believing in magic when her mother became ill. Now, between caring for her and trying to do all the things a mother usually does, Holly has no time for make-believe.But that's about to change.When Holly finds an unexpected birthday gift, she opens it to discover a mysterious message inside - along with three wishes!But these wishes have special rules. Rules that leave Holly torn between the reality of her mother's impending death and the fairytale promise that wishes really can come true - if she can summon the courage to make the forbidden wish.
author: Cornell DeVille
